sentences.en: a motor accident
sentences.cn: 车祸

sentences.en: A must is a visit to the fascinating and world-renowned Motor Museum.
sentences.cn: 一定要去参观一下那个举世闻名且精彩有趣的汽车博物馆。

sentences.en: Adhering to the new rules meant inflicting serious damage on motor racing.
sentences.cn: 遵守新的规定就意味着赛车比赛将遭受严重影响。

sentences.en: an electric motor
sentences.cn: 电动马达

sentences.en: Carlos Sainz of Spain has won the New Zealand Motor Rally.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人卡洛斯·赛恩斯在新西兰摩托车公路大赛中夺冠。

sentences.en: Carmela heard the purr of a motor-cycle coming up the drive.
sentences.cn: 卡梅拉听到摩托车隆隆地开上了车道。

sentences.en: Every few minutes the motor cut out as the machinery became jammed.
sentences.cn: 机器老是卡住，马达隔不了几分钟就突然熄火。

sentences.en: He worked as a motor mechanic.
sentences.cn: 他是一名汽车修理工。

sentences.en: It's very difficult being a woman in motor racing.
sentences.cn: 做一名女赛车手很不容易。

sentences.en: Many motor accidents are the result of unthinkingly mixing speed and alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多机动车事故都是不计后果地酒后开快车造成的。

sentences.en: motor insurance
sentences.cn: 汽车保险

sentences.en: Motor traders are looking forward to a further increase in vehicle sales.
sentences.cn: 汽车经销商预期汽车销量会进一步攀升。

sentences.en: People had to renew their motor vehicle registrations through the mail.
sentences.cn: 人们必须以书信方式重新登记机动车辆。

sentences.en: Stefano used a motor cycle to herd the sheep.
sentences.cn: 斯特凡诺骑一辆摩托车放羊。

sentences.en: That’s a nice motor you’ve got, Dave.
sentences.cn: 你这车不错啊，戴夫。

sentences.en: The fuse blew as he pressed the button to start the motor.
sentences.cn: 他按下按钮启动马达的时候保险丝烧断了。

sentences.en: the motor industry
sentences.cn: 汽车工业

sentences.en: Theft of motor vehicles is up by 15.9%.
sentences.cn: 机动车辆偷盗案上升了15.9%。

sentences.en: They were automotive component suppliers to motor manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 他们为汽车制造商供应汽车零件。

sentences.en: We belted down Iveagh Parade to where the motor was.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着艾维格大街一路飞奔到汽车那儿。

trans.tran_cn: 机动的，汽车的，运动神经的
trans.tran_en: relating to cars or other vehicles with engines
the part of a machine that makes it work or move, by changing power, especially electrical power, into movement

trans.tran_cn: 自驾游览，使用发动机驾驶帆船
